page.title: 02The hamlet of CROUCH
page.content:
Crouch is a hamlet comprising 52 houses, a public house and 2 farms. It is situated at the top of the eastern slopes of the River Bourne, about 3 km north-east of Plaxtol. It has a{population}of less than 200.
There are no shops in Crouch and its inhabitants have to do their shopping in either Borough Green or Plaxtol.
The local{farming}is largely based on {Pick-Your-Own}fruit and vegetables. There is also a riding stables which has about 30 horses.
For the past 2 years a small firm of cabinet makers has operated in the hamlet, making furniture to order.
